content:
Sandip Kumar
E-Mail:Sandip0606@gmail.com




Mobile:+91-8882022477, 9810158825
Career Objectives:

To look forward for a challenging position that offers an opportunity to explore new avenues in corporate world by utilizing my expertise domain knowledge.
PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSIS

· 4 Years experience in DBA, Developer, Database Design, Test and Production Environments on various business domains like Legal, financial,Hospitability, Healthcare etc.

· Database Administrator in Sharp Sight(Group of eye Hospitals)- Sept 2019 to till Data
· IT Experience in MS SQL Server2012/2014 in Provana India Pvt Ltd –Dec-2014 to Sept- 2018.
· 6+ years of experience in MIS Operations (NTT DATA Gurgaon – Jan 2008 to Dec-2018). 

· Extensive experience in installation, configuration and administration of MS SQL Server 2012 / 2014 versions.
· I have managed data of 1TB in the MS SQL Server database.
· Generated daily, weekly and monthly production and audit reports in Tableau 10.2.

· Maintenance of dashboards, productivity reports and quality reports in power BI.
· Administration , maintenance, and implemented Standard Operating Procedures for ensuring the  security and integrity of  the company database SQL server authentication, server roles, Database roles, Login creations and Providing permissions.

· Experience in high availability SQL Server solutions , including Log shipping, Mirroring , Replication (Transactional , Merge , Peer to Peer)

· Query Optimization  Client/Server Connectivity , Database consistency checks using  DBCC Utilities
· Very good experience in creating database objects like tables, indexes, stored procedures, functions etc.
· Excellent T-SQL Developer skills including Stored Procedures, Indexed Views, User Defined Functions, Triggers, and Distributed Transactionsusing SQL Server 2012/2014  

· Experience in using recursive CTEs, CTE, temp tables and effective DDL/DML Triggers to facilitate efficient data manipulation and data consistency as well as to support the existing applications.
· Generated multiple Enterprise reports using SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS).
· Good experience with MS SharePoint and Integration with SSRS and Power View
· Excellent Communication Skills, a good team player with problem-solving and trouble-shooting capabilities.

· Strong Analytical skills and problem-solving skills with the ability to formulate and communicate recommendations for improvement.

· Excellent verbal and written communication and organization skills, attention to details and multi-tasking abilities.

IT SKILLS

Operating Systems      Windows 7, Windows 10
Package

MS-Office 2010/2013.
RDBMS

SQL Server
Tools

              Data tool (SSIS, SSRS), Power BI, Tableau, Crystal report
Application
             MS SQL SERVER 2012/2014, MS Excel, MS AccessVisual Studio 2013
PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION
· Master in Computer Application (IGNOU), 2007

· Bachelor in Computer Application (IGNOU), 2004

ORGANISATIONAL EXPERIENCE

Company


Provana India Pvt Ltd, Noida
Role



SQL DBA-L2+ Support
Designation                                Senior Process Expert
Duration 


Dec 2014 – Sept 2018
Project


              IT APP SERVICES
Key Responsibilities :
· 24*7environment support and handling more than 200 databases  for multiple environment

· Responsibilities as a SQL Server Database Administrator include SQL server installation, Configuration, Database creation, maintenance and optimization of databases for various clients’ projects.

· Adding users in the database and granting necessary permissions and as when required logins creation, change, removal on server.

· Daily monitoring all the database backup maintenance Job’s and alerts, for monitoring purpose and maintaining the disk Space accordingly and if there is any job failures we need to remediate immediately.

· Checking the status of Backup, troubleshooting the failed backups and restoration of databases.
· Having good experience in documentation to prepare and maintain the history if there is any configuration done on particular server, also share with team members.
· Excellent T-SQL Developer skills including Stored Procedures, Indexed Views, User Defined Functions, Triggers, and Distributed Transactionsusing SQL Server 2012/2014  

· As part of a team, analyze the different high availability solutions and implemented database Log shipping ,mirroring and replication(Transactional ,Merge ,Peer to Peer)

· Database instances configuration, change, for example DB recovery model, DB or server collation, memory allocation, CPU allocation, degree of parallelism, and any other potential configuration option

· Performance monitoring and tuning of SQL server instances and databases. Regular review of database health checkup and Backup monitoring for SQL database

· Monitoring the server for High availability of the servers.(Mirroring , Log shipping , Replication, Always On-HADR , Clustering)

· Monitoring SQL Server Agent jobs - Review for failed SQL Server Agent jobs

· Ensuring data consistency in the database through DBCC commands

· Worked on Backup, Recovery and Restore, DTS Import/Export for transferring data from Database (Text format data) to SQL Server.

· Generated daily, weekly and monthly production and audit reports in Tableau 10.2.
· Maintenance of dashboards, productivity reports and quality reports in power BI.

· Preparing & presenting various monthly reports pertaining to process and productivity.

· Framework Information for Billable FTEs basis the actual volumes (Client Billing).

· Database administration for all the Databases supporting the Applications.
Company



NTT DATA, Gurgaon, India
Duration 



Jan 2008 to Dec 2014
Environment

Advance Excel, SQL server 2008 r2, Crystal Report
Project


Onyx Payments
Details:
Onyx Payments operates a global payment network and is dedicated to the creation of authentic services including commission receipt and disbursement; foreign currency exchange; invoicing; and reconciliationand tracking. Onyx Payments is a proven leader in delivering financial services to the hospitality and tourism industry. Our team facilitates over $500 million in commissions annually, by more than 40,000 hotels in 200 countries.
Key Responsibilities :
· Writing SQL Queries, Stored Procedures, Triggers, Views, Joins, Constraints, DDL, DML and User Defined Functions to implement the business logic.
· Design and develop tabular, Matrix, Drill down, Drill Trough and Parameterized reports in Crystal report using stored procedure and queries based on the requirements.
· Responsible for creating and sharing daily reports & weekly reports to the client in the form of Excel sheet.

· Extract data from heterogeneous databases and staged into staging area and applied business logic to load them in the central database.

· Performs manual data extracts from a variety of sources, including text files, Excel worksheets, and other database files, on both a scheduled.
· Conceptualizing and implementing various plans to improve MIS Reports.

· Validated and tested reports, then published the reports to the report server.

· Performs manual data extracts from a variety of sources, including text files, Excel worksheets, and other database files. 




PERSONAL VITAE

Name




Sandip Kumar
Date of Birth



06/06/1982
Nationality



Indian



Passport



Yes
Languages proficiency


English, Hindi
Declaration:
I am confident of my ability to work in a team. I hereby also declare that the information furnished above is true and correct to my knowledge.

Date___________









(Sandip Kumar)

Declaration:
I am confident of my ability to work in a team. I hereby also declare that the information furnished above is true and correct to my knowledge.

Date___________









(Sandip Kumar)

Career Objectives

Seeking a challenging database support/analytic opportunity in a dynamic environment where innovation, education & sense of ownership are valued.

Summary

· 6 + Years of experience on ERP (Maintenance & Supports) in Database as well as Reporting.

· 5+ years of Experience on MS-SQL (Developers) Queries i.e.…Procedure, view, trigger, temp table, indexes, table partitioning, function (Inline & Normal), CTE, Dynamic Query, cursor, Cube, grouping, Data Import - Export backup etc. 

· Good knowledge of relational database management systems, warehousing & completed my training on Oracle 10 g.

· Problem solving as well as Innovative approach with anarchically and database Programming Skills.

· Good knowledge of SQL SERVER 2005/2008/2012/2014, C#.net, Oracle 10g, PL/SQL also.
· Knowledge about Oracle Database with PL/SQL, MSBI, MDX Query Tool.
· Proficient in T-SQL, Dynamic Query, Sub query ,CTE Function, Procedure, backup, Restore, Import/Export, View, SSRS (Table & Matrix Report ) Drill Drown ,Sub report  Link Report ,drill though ,Parameterized etc. .net,ER Diagram, Pivot Table, Rank,Merge,Indexer, Trigger, sub query (CTE), SSIS(packages & Scripting etc.),SSRS  MS Access (Form, Joining, Report, Import, export,Report,Query design),  MS Excel .
· Working on MSBI tool SSRS, SSIS and SSAS  Knowledge about DBA as  Take backcup ,creation new user ,security access, taking care about performance of query Job scheduling , read/write Access, bottleneck etc..  .
· Good exposure on behalf MS-Excel (Vlookup, HLookup, Pivot, conditional formatting, formulas .Etc.  )

· Good Knowledge about Sql Server, Query performance, Linked Server, Job schedule as well as all Database object.
Work Experience

	   Current Company: 

	Cheapflightsfares PVT LTD Delhi( Tourism -Travel (Flights ,Hotel  & Car) Booking )


	

	  Duration- Jan 2018 to Present     Designation-  MSBI & SQL Developer (Team Lead)

	Responsibilities
	· Interaction with Staff member &Regional member Analyze the problem Business logic for Reports.

· Create new SSIS packages (using wizard or custom) as per requirement of internal department or client requirement, maintenance & create new SSRS reports (Matrix & Tablix)-.
· Point out Non Match Data Point in form of Report from two different Databases.

· Analysis the Problem of inters department & Business Logic.
· Creation of DB Obj. as per Business Logic like: SP, DML, DCL, Views, Tables, etc.

· Update records in database according to Business domain.
· Moving data from one server to another server by import/export wizard and other technique.
· Responsible for making reports & updating records using excel formula. 

· Query optimization and handle the problem regarding Database & maintenances Database & Reports.
· Achieve Regular frequently task by create Job Schedule like take Backup ,restore  Backup 
· According to need Create Stored Procedure, Function, Trigger, Sub queries, index, Temp Table...etc 


	Past  Company
	Trasaahna Services Pvt. Ltd(Banking Financial ,Loan and Insurance Services)

	Duration: Sep. 2015 TO  20 Jan 2018 Designation-  SQL Developer

	Responsibilities
	· Interaction with Bank and Region member Analyze the problem Business logic for Reports.
· Point out the discrepancy between two different databases.
· Responsible for full filling request of Management by generating new reports. 
· Responsible for Query Optimization & providing valuable inputs from data to management..

· Responsible for generation + Maintenance of company level reports
· Point out Non Match Data Point in form of Report from two different Databases.

· Handle the team Member and develop the Query for automaton reports as a Support. 

· Creation of DB Obj. as per Business Logic like: SP, DML, DCL, Views, Tables, table partitioning etc.

· Responsible for query optimization & accuracy information of the data.

· Responsible for handling ADHOC’s & generate multiple reports on the basis of database.
· Moving data from one server to another server by import/export wizard. & handle the problem regarding Database and Crystal Reports..
· Responsible for making reports & updating records using excel formula. 

· Create Stored Procedure, Function, Trigger, Sub queries, index, Temp Table…

·  Create new SSIS packages (using wizard or custom) as per requirement of internal department or client requirement, & manage of SSRS reports by wizard or custom.

· Knowledge about IT Infrastructures like (windows Installation, software installation, applications support, mail configurations… etc.  

	   Past Company: 

Sanchaytech Kirtinagar Delhi   Duration: Sep. 2014 TO  20 Sep 2015


	Responsibilities
	· Interaction with International & Nationl Client for Reports.
· Point out Non Match Data Point in form of Report from two different Databases.

· Creation of DB Obj. as per Business Logic like: SP, DML, DCL, Views, Tables, etc.

· Update records in database according to foreign invoice.

· Moving data from one server to another server by import/export wizard.

· Responsible for making reports & updating records using excel formula. 

· Query optimization and handle the problem regarding Database.
· Create Stored Procedure, Function, Trigger, Sub queries, index, Temp Table...etc. 

	 Company: 
	Sterling Ornaments Pvt.Ltd. NSEZ Noida 

	Working as a Database Support (software Executive)

	Duration:
	01  Apr ’2012 To Aug 2014
	SQL Developer
	· Responsibilities as an SQL Support on ERP. 

· Making report as per client (inter departmental users) requirement.

· Report Automation and Data Analysis as well

· Data Handling, Troubleshooting

· Install, configure, and maintain internal databases for development, testing, and integration purposes.

	 Responsibilities
	· Interaction with International Client for Reports, Point out the discrepancy between two different databases
· Point out Non Match Data Point in form of Report from two different Databases.

· Conversion of SQL Server Database into MS Access.

· Creation of DB Obj. as per Business Logic like: SP, DML, DCL, Views, Tables etc.

· Update records in database according to foreign invoice.

· Moving data from one server to another server by import/export wizard.

· Responsible for making reports & updating records using excel formula. 

· Create Report in access/Excel from database SQL/Access.

	Previous Company: 
	Ativio Sector 57 Noida UP

	Worked as a Reporting Executive for one of the biggest Publisher & Distributor company.

	Duration:
	June. 2011 TO Mar’2012
	Role: 
	 Reporting Executive

	Responsibilities
	· Helping the Team Leader in performing various team handling tasks.

· To prepare the weekly & monthly import/export report for Director.

· To prepare the catalogue subject wise for salesman... 

· To forward the dead and not supplied title summary to the clients within the month according to orders.

Work Experience : Pine Labs Pvt Ltd. Jan’18 To till date.

to data extractions and visualizations as per client need.

solution (Pine Perks) and Pine Analytics. 

• Writing SQL queries to extract daily reports and automate reports for our 
Merchants using SSRS. 

• Catchment Analysis – Identify the high transacting customers in different radius 

(1 KM, 5 Km etc) and calculating the overall footfall in the specified areas. 

• Conduct Data Analytics and generate business insights that lead to develop 
Sales & Marketing strategies. 

• Built reports and dashboards for stakeholders and investors to track various 
KPIs and metrics. 

• Assisted product owners in formulation of product strategy and insights derived. 

• Designed, developed, and support reports and dashboards using Tableau BI 
reporting platform. 

• Potential Customers and market research – Analyzed particular area or market 
(QSR) for customer footfall and calculating the overall footfall potential 
customers in the specified region. 

• Experience in finance reporting for modules.

MS SQL,Bussiness analysis,Tableau,Advanced Excel,Data visualisation.
